Nutritional Support for Critical Care and Recovery


ProT Gold is used in hospitals and care facilities to help address the increased protein needs of patients facing complex health challenges.

multitile_tq96mp.name: t:sections.multitile.name

settings.text:
Complete Protein

Fortified with essential amino acids to provide your patients a complete protein shown to help preserve lean body mass, support connective tissue protein synthesis, and promote wound healing 2x faster.²

2g of Arginine Per Serving

Arginine is a precursor for protein synthesis and other molecules important in tissue repair such as nitric oxide.
ProT Gold was originally developed to meet the high standards of medical nutrition.
It is used by over 4,000 healthcare facilities worldwide to support increased protein needs in patients.

“I have been recommending ProT Gold to my bariatric patients for over 5 years.

ProT Gold gives my patients a convenient and effective way to get high quality protein in a small volume. It also promotes fast healing of their surgical wounds."



PATRICE BRUISSON, RD, LD
MERIT HEALTH MEDICAL GROUP
